Type Method# buildBlock(_:_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<A0, A1>(
    _ a0: A0,
    _ a1: A1
) -> TupleIntentPrediction<A0.Intent, (A0, A1)> where Intent == A0.Intent, A0 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A1 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A0.Intent == A1.Intent
```

Available when `Intent` conforms to `AppIntent`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentPredictionsBuilder/buildBlock(_:_:)#see-also)
